summary: Tureg's Revival is a 1 handed dwarven sword with the effect of Mehrunes Razor.
descriptionHtml:
This is only my first mod so please no hate!
Tureg's Revival is a 1 handed dwarven sword with the effect of Mehrunes Razor. With the right perks it can be an epic sword. In order to get it just open the console (~ Key) and type help tureg. There you go!

Installation
Just extract the contents from the file and put the esp into your skyrim data folder.
author: Sevvo9
